definition: flat/(coll.) to beat (sb) up/old variant of 匾[bian3]

sentences.english: So in found that people with tonsillitis shall be timely treatment should be.
sentences.chinese: 因此在发现患有扁桃体炎时应及时予以治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the experiences in diagnosis and treatment of peritonsillar abscess.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨扁桃体周围脓肿诊断治疗的经验。

sentences.english: The otolaryngologist performed another aspiration and recommended tonsillectomy.
sentences.chinese: 再次吸引，建议扁桃体切除术。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the changes of brain electric activity in chronic tonsillitis patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察慢性扁桃体炎患者脑电活动变化。

sentences.english: and even use of a carbon dioxide laser to shrink the tonsils.
sentences.chinese: 甚至可以用二氧化碳激光器来收缩扁桃体。

sentences.english: As for the tonsillitis he suffered, I will remember for some time.
sentences.chinese: 至于他的扁桃体炎，我会记住一段时间的。

sentences.english: No medical treatment has any effect on large adenoids.
sentences.chinese: 任何医疗对扁桃体肥大都没有效果。

sentences.english: Results The tonsillar dendritic cell sarcoma had no characteristic clinical manifestations.
sentences.chinese: 结果扁桃体树突状细胞肉瘤无特征性临床表现。

sentences.english: My tonsils were so swollen that I couldn’t open my mouth more than half an inch.
sentences.chinese: 我的扁桃体肿大到了我甚至无法把嘴略微张大一些。

sentences.english: Objective To alleviate local pain following tonsillectomy and promote white membrane formation.
sentences.chinese: 目的减轻扁桃体切除术后局部疼痛，促进白膜生长。

sentences.english: Conclusions The overall prognosis of tonsillar recurrence after radiotherapy was awful and dismal.
sentences.chinese: 结论晚期扁桃体癌放疗后复发的预后差。

sentences.english: Methods There 13 peritonsillitis and 84 peritonsillar abscess patients were reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 方法分析扁桃体周围炎13例，扁周脓肿84例。

sentences.english: The malignant lymphoma is the main tumor type happened in palatine tonsil.
sentences.chinese: 在扁桃体中发生的肿瘤主要以恶性淋巴瘤为主。

sentences.english: Hypertrophy of the pharyngeal tonsils is called adenoids.
sentences.chinese: 咽扁桃体的肥大称为腺状肿大。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the therapeutic effect of different radiotherapy and the prognostic factors in patients with tonsillar carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨不同治疗方法对扁桃体癌的疗效及预后因素。

pinyin: shang4 hu1 xi1 dao4 gan3 ran3
